header.title: Romain Bongibault
header.subtitle: 5<sup>th</sup> year Computer Science and Networks student at INSA Toulouse

lexlau.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
lexlau.description: Contributed to the development and optimization of a web CRM/CMS (Vue.js, .NET): added key features (file management, authentication, document generation), improved UI and performance, performed testing and maintenance in collaboration with the technical team.

gerresheimer.title: Network Engineer Intern
gerresheimer.description: Participated in optimizing the network infrastructure of an industrial site: conducted security audits and enhancements, configured and monitored network equipment, and managed a server rack (patching, organization, documentation).

maloc.title: Backend Developer
maloc.description: Developed a robust REST API in Node.js with the AdonisJS framework: database modeling, authentication management, and creation of business endpoints. Worked closely with the Frontend team to ensure smooth feature integration and consistency between application layers.

insa.title: Engineering Degree in Computer Science and Networks
insa.location: National Institute of Applied Sciences (INSA), 31400 Toulouse, France
insa.description: Program focused on software development, networking, algorithms, and cybersecurity. Strengthened skills in programming, applied mathematics, and technical project management.

faidherbe.title: Preparatory Classes for Engineering Schools
faidherbe.description: Two intensive years consolidating my scientific foundations while developing a solid working method. This training helped me progress in logic, modeling, and computer science.

isp.title: General Baccalaureate
isp.description: Specializations: Mathematics, Physics-Chemistry, Biology – Advanced Math option. This path confirmed my interest in science and laid the groundwork for my engineering studies.

web.title: Web Developer Training
web.description: Comprehensive web development training (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, WordPress…) with practical projects: showcase site, blog, game, e-commerce, etc.

toeic.title: TOEIC® Certification – 885 / 990
toeic.description: Listening & Reading Test (INSA Toulouse, 2025) – Listening: 470 / Reading: 415 – Advanced level, valid until May 2027.

java.title: Java Developer Training
java.description: Comprehensive Java development training (Java 8 to 17) including 45 hands-on workshops, progressive project-based learning, and introduction to Java EE, Maven, and Spring Boot.

vue.title: Complete Vue.js 3 Training
vue.description: Comprehensive Vue.js 3 course to master the creation of reactive interfaces, SPA and mobile web applications, with in-depth learning of components, directives, and state management (Vuex, Pinia).
